about.summary: Functions for calculating semantic similarities between ontological terms or sets of ontological terms based on term information content and assessing statistical significance of similarity in the context of a collection of sets of ontological terms.

name: r-ontologysimilarity
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ontologysimilarity
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ontologySimilarity_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ontologySimilarity/ontologySimilarity_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7cabd41b4611426d43262e7f05a27f49a811397ffbea8d1fb95da03ce46503e6

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}            # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}      # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rcpp >=0.11.2
    - r-ontologyindex >=2.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{ native }}gcc-libs         # [win]
    - r-rcpp >=0.11.2
    - r-ontologyindex >=2.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ontologySimilarity')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ontologySimilarity')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ontologySimilarity
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: Functions for calculating semantic similarities between ontological terms or sets
    of ontological terms based on term information content and assessing statistical
    significance of similarity in the context of a collection of sets of ontological
    terms.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: ontologySimilarity
# Type: Package
# Title: Functions for Calculating Ontological Similarities
# Version: 2.2
# Date: 2016-10-20
# Author: Daniel Greene
# Maintainer: Daniel Greene <dg333@cam.ac.uk>
# Description: Functions for calculating semantic similarities between ontological terms or sets of ontological terms based on term information content and assessing statistical significance of similarity in the context of a collection of sets of ontological terms.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# Imports: Rcpp (>= 0.11.2), ontologyIndex (>= 2.0)
# LinkingTo: Rcpp
# Depends: R (>= 3.0.0)
# Suggests: knitr, paintmap
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# RoxygenNote: 5.0.1
# NeedsCompilation: yes
# Packaged: 2016-10-27 16:15:45 UTC; dg333
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2016-10-28 01:14:47
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
